- Education: Bachelor’s degree in Sociology

Since he has no steady income, he is on a tight budget and is actively looking for ways to save money while seeking employment. He is financially cautious and prioritizes essentials over luxuries.

James is practical when it comes to shopping. He looks for second-hand items or budget-friendly stores when purchasing clothing or necessities. He prefers to shop in person so he can assess the quality of items but also takes advantage of online sales and thrift shops. He favors items that are versatile and can be mixed and matched easily.

Living Situation:
James resides in an affordable shared apartment with friends in a diverse neighborhood. He enjoys the community feel and believes it aligns with his values of connection and support. He tries to maintain a positive outlook despite his current unemployment status and is committed to finding a meaningful job soon.
